attributes.action: Stop the immigration of Muslims to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish to totally stop immigration into the UK.
We further request that all immigrants within the UK should be checked to determine if they are here legally and those that are not should be immediately removed.
Those that are here legally (including those born here) should be interviewed and assesed on their loyalty to and future intentions within the UK.
We further request that all Faith leaders in the UK be investigated as to their co-operation in regard to reporting and influencing those radicals whom go on to commit terrorist activities. If found to be not co-operating then these religious leaders should be removed from the UK
We further demand that the use of foreign doctors being brought into the UK be stopped in favour of doctors living and trained in the UK

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
